pages.text: You can find $(item)Materials$() in $(thing)Caves$(), $(thing)The Nether$() and $(thing)The End$(). There are $(thing)20 different types$() of Material, all having $(thing)4 tiers$() to work with. Each $(l:kingdomkeys:synthesize/recipes)recipe$() will call for a different combination of Materials so it's best to grab whatever you can find! Remember, some materials can only be found in $(thing)certain biomes and locations$().
